lessonSubtitleText: Test how well you know this story

questions.text: What did Abraham send his servant Eliezer to do?
answers: Find a wife for Isaac
Find a new land for Abraham to live in
Buy camels and bring them home
Find a pet dog for Isaac

questions.text: Why was Abraham certain the servant would be successful?
answers: God promised to grow his family into a great nation
Eliezer was the wisest man in the land
Abraham was feeling lucky
Isaac was a very hunky dude
Let the right woman say, "I'll get water for your camels, too."
Let the right woman offer me bread and a place to stay
Let the right woman glow like an angel
Let the right woman bring gifts and treasure for Abraham

questions.text: Who came to the well before the servant finished praying?
answers: Rebekah
Sarah
Rachel
Mary

questions.text: What did the servant give to Rebekah?
answers: Gold jewelry
A high-five
A new camel
A picture of Isaac
Rebekah's father and brother
Abraham's kids
Isaac's best friends
Servants who traveled with Eliezer

questions.text: When the servant told Bethuel and Laban what happened, what did they say?
answers: The Lord has done this, let Rebekah marry Isaac
We do not believe this story
We'll never let Rebekah leave
Isaac must come here to live with us

questions.text: Where was Isaac when Rebekah and the servant returned?
answers: Thinking in a field
Working in a tent
Taking a nap
Lost in the woods

questions.text: What did Isaac do after meeting Rebekah? How did he feel about her?
answers: He married her and loved her
He sent her back to her family
He ran and hid
He asked Abraham to choose a different woman
